modName: Hakan the Grey - Nord male companion
descriptionHtml:
Name: Hakan the Grey
Category: Companions
Version: 1.0
Date: 2012/07/01

------------------- [This is what? ] -----------------------

A Nord male companion

Class: GuardImperial
Specialization: 1-handed weapon, heavy armor. 
Level: Calculated from 5 to 60.
Morality; Violence Against Enemits
Marriable
Non-Essential  
Initial Armor: Imperial Heavy Armor
Initial Weapon: Steel Mace
------------------- [Location] ----------------------

He normally walks in Dragonsreach (3 days every week))))

------------------- [Install] -----------------------
Copy and overwrite in Skyrim DATA folder 
NMM is recommended.
Put the checkmark at the SNGakan.esp in your launcher or NMM 

Just delete the esp.file to uninstall the mod


----------------------[Bugs]--------------------------------
The color contrast between face and body is possible. 





------------------- [Licensing / Legal] -------------
You are welcome to modify or reuse,  just give me credit.



Enjoy!
Sandraniks
author: Sandraniks
